idea-plugin.name: Corporate Theme
idea-plugin.description:
Corporate is a new theme for customized IDEs using a corporate pallete. This plugin can be used with versions 2019.1 and 2019.2.

The theme features corporate branding:
  • A cleaner editor scheme with regular font styles instead of bolds
  • A unified theme for Windows, macOS and Linux
The goal of this them is to demonstrate installing and updating plugins internally.

To install:
  1. Go to Settings | Plugins, find the theme plugin and install it
  2. Restart the IDE
  3. Go to Settings | Appearance & Behavior | Appearance and select IntelliJ Light Preview in the Theme dropdown
